definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: Mosquito coils or other insecticide vaporizers may also reduce indoor biting.
sentences.chinese: 盘式蚊香和杀虫剂喷雾器也可减少室内叮咬。

sentences.english: the stray betrayer arrayed the sprayers on the road.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔的背约者在道路上摆列喷雾器。

sentences.english: If you can aim very good, you will be able to take down sprayers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能很好的目标，你将能够取下喷雾器。

sentences.english: The sprayers in the produce aisle got me again.
sentences.chinese: 在农产品的货道的喷雾器又喷到我了。

sentences.english: A cool mist vaporizer may be useful in the home.
sentences.chinese: 在家中，一个清凉的喷雾器也许会有用。

sentences.english: You should also keep a sprayer close by to help you clear enemies.
sentences.chinese: 您还应该保持密切的喷雾器，以帮助您清除敌人。

sentences.english: People are spraying insecticide on the fruit trees with sprayers.
sentences.chinese: 果园里，大家正在用喷雾器给果树喷洒杀虫剂。

sentences.english: Use it for general cleaning by adding 4 tbs to 1 q of water in a  spray bottle.
sentences.chinese: 喷雾器里，一夸脱水兑四勺苏打可做成一般清洁剂。

sentences.english: If sprayers spray diluted vinegar and the results will be even better.
sentences.chinese: 如果用喷雾器喷洒稀醋，效果会更好。

sentences.english: Fine drops of oil were sprayed into the space between the plates by an atomizer.
sentences.chinese: 利用喷雾器把细小的油滴喷入极板间的空间内。

sentences.english: For large areas of clean and available sprayers or rotary cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 对于大面积的清洁，可用喷雾器或旋转清洁机进行。

sentences.english: When against a sprayer, it's a different story.
sentences.chinese: 当对一个喷雾器，这是一个不同的故事。

sentences.english: A few drops of essential oils in your bath or in a diffuser will do the trick.
sentences.chinese: 在浴室或喷雾器里滴入几滴精油会起作用。

sentences.english: Plug the flow regulator into the wall and attach the nebulizer.
sentences.chinese: 将气流调节器插头接通墙上电源，并连接喷雾器。

sentences.english: For such packs, storage of the sprayer attachment is a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 对于这样的包，喷雾器附件的存储是一个挑战。

sentences.english: A warm iron and a can of spray starch can do wonders.
sentences.chinese: 热熨斗和喷雾器也能创造奇迹。

definition: drip irrigation/to irrigate by drip feed
